sn37.7:1.1: “Pancahi, anuruddha, dhammehi samannagato matugamo kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati.
sn37.7:1.3: Assaddho ca hoti, ahiriko ca hoti, anottappi ca hoti, issuki ca hoti, duppanno ca hoti—
sn37.7:1.4: imehi kho, anuruddha, pancahi dhammehi samannagato matugamo kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati”ti.
